### [Township News](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1,6)

1. #### [Cloak and Dagger Unveils Expanded Entertainment Hub on Route 33 in Hamilton](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=311)

   Mayor Jeff Martin, Assemblyman Wayne DeAngelo, and Assemblywoman Tennielle McCoy joined owner, Brian Martin and his team on November 14, 2025, to celebrate the for the official ribbon cutting of Cloak and Dagger‚Äôs brand-new, expanded facility located [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=311)
2. #### [Statement from Mayors on Trenton Water Works' Water Conservation Advisory](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=310)

   Today, TWW released a statement calling for voluntary water conservation for Trenton Water Works (TWW) customers due to frazil ice conditions. Ewing, Hopewell Township, and Hamilton Mayor Jeff Martin have the following joint statement. [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=310)
3. #### [Cheers to a New Era: Olde Nottingham Tavern Unveils State-of-the-Art Indoor-Outdoor Patio](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=309)

   The Olde Nottingham Tavern, affectionately known as ‚Äúthe Nott‚Äù and a beloved Hamilton landmark, celebrated a significant milestone last week with the official opening of its new, state-of-the-art indoor-outdoor patio. The grand event was attended by local [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=309)
4. #### [QDOBA Brings Fresh, Hand-Crafted Mexican Eats to Hamilton](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=307)

   QDOBA Mexican Eats, the leading fast-casual restaurant known for its customizable, fresh entr√©es and signature free-of-charge guacamole and queso, celebrated its Grand Opening and Ribbon Cutting ceremony on November 17, 2025, at its new Hamilton Township [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=307)
5. #### [DTLR Steps Into Hamilton‚Äôs Independence Plaza](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=306)

   Councilman Anthony Carabelli Jr. welcomed DTLR, to Independence Plaza (2465 S. Broad St.), with a grand opening celebration on Friday, November 7, marking its first location in Mercer County. [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=306)
6. #### [Matakas Jiu Jitsu Celebrates Grand Opening of New Hamilton Location](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=305)

   Mayor Martin was present to welcome Matakas Jiu Jitsu with a ribbon-cutting of its newest Hamilton location on Friday, November 14, 2025. Located in the Clover Plaza on Quakerbridge Road, it marks the school‚Äôs second location and its first in Hamilton. [Read on...](https://www.hamiltonnj.com/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=305)
